subject: Re: Fw: Fw: Eptec External Web Page - Safety
preview: Hi Des,  No worries!  Looking forward to your feedback very soon.

full_threads.body:
Hi Des,

No worries!

Looking forward to your feedback very soon.

Morning Joy,

Thanks for the updates, I'll review and may need to work with another team member to check the updates (I'm still relatively new).

As a side note, Fransie is no longer with the business, but please keep Anne and I updated.

Thanks again.





Regards,

Des

M:0417 833 810

Desiree Anderson

​​​​

Executive Assistant / Office Manager



Eptec Group

Hi Fransie,

Lovely Friday!

We're happy to inform you that we've completed the updates below:

Changes to existing pages (duplicated for your review — not yet live until approved)
  1. Certifications
  2. Policies

New HSSEQ pages:
  1. Zero Harm Journey
  2. Zero Harm System
  3. Environmental, Social & Governance

Please take a moment to review the updates and share any feedback or approval once you are available.

Hope you have a wonderful weekend!

action.text: Allie Borcena moved this conversation from the Wolf IQ inbox
Joy T assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Hi Fransie,

Thank you for sending through your requests for the Certifications and Policies page.

We will check on these and make the necessary updates for eptec.com.au.

We should be able to send you an update on the progress later this week.

Thanks,
Joy

Hi Fransie,

Worked with Mark this afternoon and we finalised the Deck that I believe we can use to develop the HSSEQ Web page section, with drop downs - Link herewith:- HSSEQ Web Page - Fransie

Main Page Title and drop downs propose:

  • HSSEQ
    • Zero Harm Journey
    • Zero Harm System
    • Environmental, Social & Governance
    • Policies
    • Certification & Accreditation

We have also added current policies and certifications to the folder to simplify the source of such documents and make it easy to update and maintain. (Mark uploading this afternoon)

Need to talk to Anne about this one as the internal web page is ok but documents included/linked are outdated - Eptec Group Reconciliation Action Plan

Enjoy your weekend!

Kind regards,

Tertius
